title: [Health] Greater depression and anxiety symptoms are associated with both a reduced tendency to gather more information in situations of uncertainty and a reduced tendency to rely on current knowledge to efficiently seek out reward

[Medicine] 3-Hydroxybutyrate Ameliorates the Progression of Diabetic Nephropathy — Mice were fed normal chow, high-fat, or ketogenic diets (KD) containing precursors of 3-OHB. — this study shows in both in vivo and in vitro models… delays the progression by augmenting autophagy and inhibiting oxidative stress.
